name: Discovering to the deep of Cham Culture!
description:
Cham culture was one of three the first cultures in Vietnam. From more than 2000 years ago, Champa people built a strong kingdom. Cham Kingdom located in which is today central and southern Vietnam. 
With this trip, you can discover to the deep of Cham Culture, from overview to detail. Some destiantions are Cham Museum, Bang An Cham tower and My Son Holy Land, you can have a comparation Cham Culture to Viet Culture when we visit Vinahouse Space.
Enjoy your trip and tell me your feeling!
